name: abbid
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wsb(hs0, s0, w1), wsb(hs0, s0, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w1)
-| diffsw(hs0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wsb(hs0, s0, w1), wsb(hs0, s0, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w1)
-| diffsw(hs0, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(hs0, s0, w1), wsb(hs0, s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w1)
-| diffsw(hs0, w2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| diffsw(hs0, w0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w1)
-| diffsw(hs0, w2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffss(hs0, s0)

|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| diffsw(hs0, w0)
-| diffsw(hs0, w1)
-| diffsw(hs0, w2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| diffsw(hs0, w1)
-| diffsw(hs0, w2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| diffsw(hs0, w2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Equivalent wff's yield equal class abstractions (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) Avoid ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-10 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 6-May-2023.)
